name: Connect (itch) (murchanskii)
description:
Connect is a casual stress relieving game, in which you have to join the dots into chains. Create closed polygons, short and long dot sequences, get higher score and break your records!

Game features:

- No rush, no stress! Play at your own pace without any time limit.

- Smooth animation and pleasant sound effects.

- Simple rules. We welcome players of all ages!

- Day and night theme.

- Colorblind mode.

Connect is a completely free puzzle game to play, available online. It is a great choice for those who want to relieve tension and spend some time with the benefit of training their mind. Connect them all and see how far you can get!
